info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:15PM CDT until June 16 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR GRANT...SOUTHEASTERN SALINE AND NORTHEASTERN HOT SPRING COUNTIES... At 314 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tull, or 10 miles south of Benton, moving southeast at 40 mph. Most recently, this storm produced prolific golf ball sized hail over much of southwestern Saline County. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Benton... Bryant... Malvern... Sheridan... Haskell... Rockport... Traskwood... Leola... Tull... Prattsville... Poyen... Perla... Cane Creek... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Orion... Thiel... Dogwood... East End... Bauxite... Belfast... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
